title: Ep 148 | You Can't Spell Science Without Si, Jase Rants About Deceptive Ads, and Jesus' Last Blast
description:
Phil proves that Jase is hard-headed. Jase shares a teal report, including the fascinating way Si determined the flying speed of a green-winged teal. Jase is also fired up about "deceptive advertising" by 7-Eleven, Motel 6, and Super 8. Al points out where you'll find some of Jesus' most amazing teachings. And the guys talk about the meaning of foot-washing in the Bible, macho men as servants, and how people who really know Jesus don't mind you bringing him up.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
